messages.message:
Can the predicted value of the previous query can be passed to the next query dynamically?
For e.g.,
1. What is the vendor name? Field: *VendorName* Value: Instabase
2.  What is the address of *@VendorName*? 
Reason:
In the below example the model predicted the name correctly but not the address, the value predicted previously for vendor name query and the value is passed to the next query to fetch the address of the <vendorname> it works well. So if this can be enabled dynamically, it may help in many other scenarios
Good point @Varun K V!! @avi Something to think about, it mostly has to do with user experience. On the model side it's doable.
Yup, we should definitely think about adding this. cc: @Eric Han
to be even more flexible, is it possible to embed regex<@VendorName> or inline function(@VendorName) command similar to what we have in refiner today to a query
